title: Ardougne Diary

properties.name: description
properties.value: For a list of every task sorted by certain requirements, see Achievement Diary/All achievements.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Ardougne achievements

For a list of every task sorted by certain requirements, see Achievement Diary/All achievements.

Ardougne Diary
Released 5 March 2015 (Update)
Area(s) Ardougne, Port Khazard and Yanille
Members Yes
Item reward Cloak
Lamp XP rewards 2,500
7,500
15,000
50,000
Taskmaster(s) Two-pints
Levels required
Total level: 1279
 ----  ----  52
 50  90  91
 13  45  81
 60  82  91
 42  50  50
 94  69  50
 65  10  85
 50  59
56 107

The Ardougne Diary is a set of achievement diaries whose tasks revolve around areas in and near Ardougne, such as Yanille and Port Khazard.

Two-pints's location.

Several skill, quest and item requirements are needed to complete all tasks. Unless stated otherwise, temporary skill boosts can be used to meet the skill requirements.

Rewards can be claimed from Two-pints in the Flying Horse Inn, in East Ardougne. Note that the previous tiers of a diary must be completed to claim rewards of the next tier.

Contents

  • 1 Overview
  • 2 Easy
    • 2.1 Rewards
  • 3 Medium
    • 3.1 Rewards
  • 4 Hard
    • 4.1 Rewards
  • 5 Elite
    • 5.1 Rewards
  • 6 Changes
  • 7 References

Overview[edit | edit source]

The rewards can be claimed from Two-pints. She is located at the Flying Horse Inn in Ardougne.

Skill Requirements[1][2]
5
 
27+
Quest Requirements
Biohazard
Rune Mysteries
Additional Requirements
None
  1. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.

Rewards

  • Ardougne cloak 1
    • Unlimited teleports to the Ardougne Monastery
  • Antique lamp worth 2,500 experience in any skill above 30
  • Double death runes (200) when trading in cats to civilians
  • 10% increased chance to successfully steal from stalls in Ardougne
  • Jubster and Frogeel drops will be noted at the Tower of Life

Skill Requirements[1][2]

Underground Pass
Additional Requirements
Started Fairytale II - Cure a Queen
Started Sea Slug
Reached the part of the Watchtower quest that grants access to the Skavid caves
  1. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.
  3. ^ 3.0 3.1 59 for ironmen or access to the Ancient Cavern.

Rewards

  • Ardougne cloak 2
    • Three daily teleports to Ardougne farm patch
  • Antique lamp worth 7,500 experience in any skill of level 40 or higher
  • 100 free noted pure essence every day from Wizard Cromperty
  • Unicow, Newtroost, and Spidine drops will be noted at the Tower of Life
  • 10% increased chance to pickpocket in Ardougne (even if the cloak is not equipped or in inventory)
  • Ability to toggle the Ring of life teleport to Ardougne
  • Receive additional runes when crafting essence at the Ourania Altar

Watchtower
Additional Requirements
None
  1. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.

Rewards

  • Ardougne cloak 3
    • Five daily teleports to Ardougne farm patch
  • Antique lamp worth 15,000 experience in any skill above 50
  • 150 free noted pure essence every day from Wizard Cromperty
  • Ability to toggle Watchtower Teleport to the centre of Yanille
  • 10% increased chance of succeeding when pickpocketing around Gielinor (even if the cloak is not equipped or in inventory)

Skill Requirements[1][2]

Desert Treasure

Additional Requirements
800,000 Nightmare Zone points
  1. ^ Some skills may be boostable, review the main section for more details.
  2. ^ In addition, some tasks of a lower tier may have higher requirements. Players must complete all the tasks of the previous tiers before they can claim the rewards for the current tier.
  3. ^ An additional 3+ other quests to access the Nightmare Zone (see page for list of applicable quests).

Rewards

  • Ardougne cloak 4
    • Unlimited teleports to Ardougne farm patch
  • Antique lamp worth 50,000 experience in any skill above 70
  • 250 free noted pure essence every day from Wizard Cromperty
  • 50% more fish from Fishing Trawler
  • 25% more marks of grace from the Ardougne Rooftop Course
  • Bert will automatically deliver 84 buckets of sand to your bank each day you log in (unless you are an Ultimate Ironman), even if you cancel membership

Easy[edit | edit source]

Ardougne Diary Easy Map
Items Required
  • Silk
  • 100 coins (200 is recommended)
  • Rusty sword (two are recommended)
  • Knife or slashing weapon
Skills Needed
  • 5 Thieving
Quests required
  • Biohazard
    • Plague City
  • Rune Mysteries
Task Requirements
1. Have Wizard Cromperty teleport you to the Rune essence mine (right-click him to Teleport).
  • Completion of Rune Mysteries
2. Steal a cake from the East Ardougne market stalls.
  • 5 Thieving
3. Sell silk to the Silk trader in East Ardougne for 60 coins each.
  • Silk
  • Can be stolen from his silk stall, however 10 minutes must pass from the last stolen silk before he talks to you.
4. Use the altar in East Ardougne's church (requires less than full Prayer points). None
5. Go out fishing on the Fishing Trawler (you only need to start the minigame) None
6. Enter the Combat Training Camp north of West Ardougne.
  • Completion of Biohazard
7. Have Tindel Marchant identify a rusty sword for you.
  • Rusty sword and 100 coins
  • You might need to do this more than once, as there is a 1/96 chance the sword turns out to be nothing
8. Use the Ardougne lever to teleport to the Wilderness (you may pull the lever there to return). None
9. View Aleck's Hunter Emporium in Yanille. None
10. Check what pets you have insured with Probita in East Ardougne (right-click her to Check). None

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Ardougne cloak 1
    • Unlimited teleports to the Ardougne Monastery
  • Antique lamp worth 2,500 experience in any skill above 30
  • Double death runes (200) when trading in cats to civilians
  • 10% increased chance to successfully steal from stalls in Ardougne
  • Jubster and Frogeel drops will be noted at the Tower of Life

Medium[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • Dramen or Lunar staff
  • Mith grapple and any crossbow
  • Means to cast Ardougne Teleport (2 water runes and 2 law runes)
  • 3 strawberry seeds
  • Rake
  • Seed dibber
  • Yew log, or a total of 11 yew logs and one regular log if the balloon route to Castle Wars has not been unlocked yet
  • Raw chicken
  • Raw swordfish
  • Any light source
  • Skavid map
  • Iban's upgraded staff, or 200,000 coins and Iban's staff to upgrade it
  • Fishing rod and bait, or a small fishing net

Recommended:

  • Basket of apples
Skills Needed
  • 39 Agility
  • 50 Attack
  • 10 Construction[?]
  • 49 Crafting
  • 31 Farming
  • 50 Firemaking
  • 51 Magic
  • 25 Ranged[?]
  • 38 Strength
  • 38 Thieving
  • 36 Woodcutting[?]
  • 20 Quest points[?]

Ironmen:

  • 59 Fletching[?]
  • 59 Smithing[?]
Quests Required
  • Started Fairytale II - Cure a Queen
    • Fairytale I - Growing Pains
      • Lost City
      • Nature Spirit
        • The Restless Ghost
        • Priest in Peril
  • Enlightened Journey
  • The Hand in the Sand
  • Watchtower (partial completion)
  • Sea Slug (partial completion)
  • Tower of Life
  • Underground Pass
    • Biohazard
      • Plague City
Task Requirements
1. Enter the unicorn pen in Ardougne Zoo using Fairy rings (bis).
  • Started Fairytale II - Cure a Queen
  • Dramen or Lunar staff
2. Grapple over Yanille's south wall and jump off.
  • 39 Agility, 38 Strength and 21 Ranged
  • Mith grapple and any crossbow
3. Harvest some strawberries from the Ardougne farming patch.
  • 31 Farming
  • 3 strawberry seeds, spade, rake and a seed dibber
  • Recommended: a basket of apples to pay the nearby gardener to make sure the crop grows
4. Cast the Ardougne Teleport spell.
  • Completion of Plague City
  • 51 Magic and means to cast Ardougne Teleport ( 2 2 )
5. Travel to Castle Wars by Hot Air Balloon.
  • Completion of Enlightened Journey
  • 50 Firemaking
  • Yew log
  • If the route has not been unlocked yet, a total of 11 yew logs and one regular log are needed to unlock the trip, then fly back and forth once.
6. Claim buckets of sand from Bert in Yanille.
Ultimate Ironman only; Fill a bucket with sand using Bert's sand pit.
  • Completion of The Hand in the Sand
    Ultimate Ironman only; Bucket
7. Catch any fish on the Fishing Platform.
  • Started Sea Slug
  • Fishing rod and bait, or a small fishing net
8. Pickpocket the master farmer north of East Ardougne.
  • 38 Thieving
9. Collect some cave nightshade from the Skavid caves (can be found in the northernmost cave).
  • Partial completion of Watchtower
  • Any light source and the Skavid map
10. Kill a swordchick in the Tower of Life (southwest in the basement).
  • Completion of Tower of Life
  • Raw chicken and raw swordfish
11. Equip an Iban's upgraded staff or upgrade an Iban's staff.
  • Completion of Underground Pass
  • Iban's upgraded staff, or 200,000 coins and Iban's staff to have the Dark Mage in West Ardougne upgrade it.
12. Visit the island east of the Necromancer Tower (air).
  • Started Fairytale II - Cure a Queen
  • Dramen or Lunar staff

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Ardougne cloak 2
    • Three daily teleports to Ardougne farm patch
  • Antique lamp worth 7,500 experience in any skill of level 40 or higher
  • 100 free noted pure essence every day from Wizard Cromperty
  • Unicow, Newtroost, and Spidine drops will be noted at the Tower of Life
  • 10% increased chance to pickpocket in Ardougne (even if the cloak is not equipped or in inventory[1])
  • Ability to toggle the Ring of life teleport to Ardougne
  • Receive additional runes when crafting essence at the Ourania Altar

Hard[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • An uncharged skills necklace or combat bracelet
  • Means to cast Watchtower teleport (2 earth runes and 2 law runes)
  • Rope
  • Small fishing net
  • Palm tree sapling
  • Rake
  • Spade
  • Poison ivy seed
  • Seed dibber
  • Hammer
  • 5 mithril bars
  • 25,000 coins if your house is not in Yanille
  • Shield left half
  • Shield right half
  • Pure or daeyalt essence
  • Death talisman, or access to the Abyss

Recommended:

  • Lockpick
  • 15 Papaya fruit
Skills Needed
  • 56 Agility[?]
  • 50 Construction
  • 53 Cooking[?]
  • 50 Crafting[?]
  • 70 Farming
  • 53 Fishing[?]
  • 5 Fletching[?]
  • 45 Herblore[?](boostable)
  • 59 Hunter
  • 66 Magic
  • 52 Mining[?]
  • 42 Prayer[?]
  • 60 Ranged[?]
  • 65 Runecraft(boostable)
  • 68 Smithing(boostable)
  • 50 Strength[?]
  • 72 Thieving(boostable)
  • 50 Woodcutting[?]
  • 107 Quest points[?]
Quests Required
  • Monkey Madness I
    • The Grand Tree
    • Tree Gnome Village
  • Legends' Quest
    • Family Crest
    • Heroes' Quest
      • Shield of Arrav
      • Lost City
      • Merlin's Crystal
      • Dragon Slayer I
    • Shilo Village
      • Jungle Potion
        • Druidic Ritual
  • Mourning's End Part II
    • Mourning's End Part I
      • Big Chompy Bird Hunting
      • Sheep Herder
      • Roving Elves
        • Waterfall Quest
        • Regicide
          • Underground Pass
            • Biohazard
              • Plague City
  • Watchtower
Task Requirements
1. Recharge some jewellery at the Totem pole in the Legends' Guild.
  • Completion of Legends' Quest
  • Less than fully charged skills necklace or combat bracelet
2. Enter the Magic Guild.
  • 66 Magic
3. Attempt to steal from a chest in Ardougne Castle.
  • 72 Thieving
  • Lockpick is recommended
4. Have a zookeeper put you in Ardougne Zoo's monkey cage.
  • Partial completion of the Monkey Madness I quest
  • Karamjan monkey greegree
5. Teleport to the Watchtower.
  • Completion of the Watchtower
  • 58 Magic and means to cast the Watchtower teleport ( 2 2 )
6. Catch a Red Salamander.
  • 59 Hunter
  • Rope and small fishing net
7. Check the health of a palm tree near Tree Gnome Village (the patch next to Gileth).
  • 68 Farming
  • Palm tree sapling, spade and a rake
  • Recommended: 15 Papaya fruit to pay the gardener
8. Pick some poison ivy berries from the patch south of East Ardougne (Near the Ardougne Monastery).
  • 70 Farming
  • Poison ivy seed, seed dibber and a rake
9. Smith a Mithril platebody near Ardougne (the Port Khazard, Yanille, or West Ardougne anvil).
  • 68 Smithing
  • 5 mithril bars and a hammer
10. Enter your POH from Yanille.
  • 50 Construction(not boostable)
  • 25,000 coins if your house is not yet in Yanille
11. Smith a Dragon sq shield in West Ardougne.
  • 60 Smithing
  • Shield left half, shield right half and a hammer
12. Craft some death runes from essence.
  • Completion of Mourning's End Part II
  • 65 Runecraft
  • Pure or daeyalt essence and a death talisman or access to the Abyss
  • If entering via the Mourner Headquarters, you require Mourner Gear and a crystal trinket

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Ardougne cloak 3
    • Five daily teleports to Ardougne farm patch
  • Antique lamp worth 15,000 experience in any skill above 50
  • 150 free noted pure essence every day from Wizard Cromperty
  • Ability to toggle Watchtower Teleport to the centre of Yanille
  • 10% increased chance of succeeding when pickpocketing around Gielinor

Elite[edit | edit source]

Items Required
  • Lockpick
  • Yew log
  • Sinew
  • Runite bar
  • Salve amulet(i) or Salve amulet(ei), or the regular Salve amulet and 800,000 Nightmare Zone points to imbue it
    • Note that this cannot be a Salve Amulet imbued via Soul Wars[2]
  • Torstol seed
  • Seed dibber
  • Rake
  • Means to cast Ice Barrage (2 blood runes, 4 death runes and 6 water runes)
  • Hammer
  • Knife

Recommended:

  • Ultracompost
Skills Needed
  • 90 Agility(boostable)
  • 91 Cooking(boostable)
  • 35 Crafting[?]
  • 85 Farming
  • 50 Firemaking[?]
  • 81 Fishing(not boostable)
  • 69 Fletching
  • 10 Herblore[?]
  • 94 Magic(boostable)
  • 40 Ranged[?]
  • 91 Smithing(boostable)
  • 82 Thieving(boostable)
Quests Required
  • Desert Treasure
    • The Dig Site
      • Druidic Ritual
    • Temple of Ikov
    • The Tourist Trap
    • Troll Stronghold
      • Death Plateau
    • Priest in Peril
    • Waterfall Quest
  • Haunted Mine
Task Requirements
1. Catch a manta ray in the Fishing Trawler and cook it in Port Khazard.
  • 81 Fishing(not boostable) and 91 Cooking
  • Multiple raw manta rays may be needed in case the player burns them
2. Attempt (and succeed) to picklock the door to the basement of Yanille Agility dungeon.
  • 82 Thieving
  • Lockpick
3. Pickpocket a hero.
  • 80 Thieving
4. Make a rune crossbow yourself from scratch within Witchaven or Yanille.
You must use the spinning wheel in Witchaven to make the crossbow string, and the anvil in
Yanille to make the runite limbs. Then finish making the crossbow in either of the two towns.
  • 10 Crafting, 91 Smithing and 69 Fletching
  • Yew logs, runite bar, hammer, knife, and sinew or a non-magic tree root.
5. Imbue a salve amulet at Nightmare Zone or equip a salve amulet(i).
This cannot be imbued via Zeal Tokens from Soul Wars[3].
  • Completion of the Haunted Mine
  • Access to the Nightmare Zone
  • Salve amulet(i) or Salve amulet(ei), or the regular Salve amulet and 800,000 Nightmare Zone points to imbue it
6. Pick some torstol from the patch north of East Ardougne.
  • 85 Farming
  • Torstol seed, seed dibber and a rake
  • Ultracompost is recommended
7. Complete a lap of Ardougne's rooftop agility course.
  • 90 Agility
8. Cast Ice Barrage on another player within Castle Wars.
  • Completion of Desert Treasure
  • 94 Magic (boostable from 85 with a Castlewars brew) and means to cast Ice Barrage ( 6 2 4 )

Rewards[edit | edit source]

  • Ardougne cloak 4
    • Unlimited teleports to Ardougne farm patch
  • Antique lamp worth 50,000 experience in any skill above 70
  • 250 free noted pure essence every day from Wizard Cromperty
  • 50% more fish from Fishing Trawler
  • 25% more marks of grace from the Ardougne Rooftop Course
  • Bert will automatically deliver 84 buckets of sand to your bank each day you log in (unless you are an Ultimate Ironman), even if you cancel membership

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
14 April 2021
(update)

All diary tasks to craft runes were changed to clarify they only can be completed with essence.

13 October 2016
(update | poll)

Completing the medium Ardougne achievement diary now grants additional runes when crafting essence at the Ourania Altar, with no additional experience.

24 September 2015
(update)

Typo fixed in Ardougne Diary's journal.

16 July 2015
(update)

Fixed misspelling of "receive" in Ardougne, Karamja, Morytania and Wilderness Diaries.

25 June 2015
(update)

The Ardougne elite diary rewards now give increased Marks of Grace on the Ardougne rooftop course.

21 May 2015
(update)

Completing all Ardougne elite tasks now prompts the correct message box.

7 May 2015
(update)

Collecting the nightshade in the southern skavid cave now completes the Ardougne medium task.

30 April 2015
(update)

It is no longer possible to skip a step of the 'Make a rune crossbow yourself from scratch' achievement diary task.

16 April 2015
(update)

Removed some incorrect text from a task in the Ardougne Diary.

26 March 2015
(update)

Changed the sand delivery Ardougne Medium task for Ultimate Ironmen to "Fill a bucket with sand using Bert's sand pit. "

6 March 2015
(update)
  • The medium task of "Upgrade an Iban staff" has been changed to "Equip an upgraded Iban staff".
  • The elite task of "Imbue a salve amulet at Nightmare Zone" has been changed to "Equip a salve amulet (ei)".

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 9 June 2017. (Archived from the original on 25 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "No, you just need to have unlocked the diary reward."
  2. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 3 February 2021. (Archived from the original on 5 February 2021.) Mod Ash: "Yes. Seems to be the case for everything that can be imbued in the two different places - rings, amulets, etc. I suspect that was to stop people getting the imbue in one place, then trying to refund it in the other place."
  3. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 3 February 2021. (Archived from the original on 5 February 2021.) Mod Ash: "Yes. Seems to be the case for everything that can be imbued in the two different places - rings, amulets, etc. I suspect that was to stop people getting the imbue in one place, then trying to refund it in the other place."

style="vertical-align:top" | {| class="wikitable lighttable" |- !Additional Requirements |- |800,000 [[Nightmare Zone]] points |} |} {{Reflist}} '''Rewards''' *[[Ardougne cloak 4]] **Unlimited teleports to [[Ardougne]] [[farm patch]] *[[Antique lamp]] worth 50,000 experience in any skill above 70 *250 free noted [[pure essence]] every day from [[Wizard Cromperty]] *50% more fish from [[Fishing Trawler]] *25% more [[marks of grace]] from the [[Ardougne Rooftop Course]] *[[Bert]] will automatically deliver 84 [[buckets of sand]] to your bank each day you log in (unless you are an [[Ultimate Ironman]]), even if you cancel membership |-| ==Easy== {{Map|mtype=pin|zoom=0|width=400|height=400|align=right|caption=Ardougne Diary Easy Map |x:2683,y:3326,title:[[Wizard Cromperty]],desc:1. Have Wizard Cromperty teleport you to the [[Rune essence mine]]. |x:2667,y:3310,title:[[Ardougne Baker's Stall.|Baker's Stall]],desc:2. Steal a [[cake]] from the [[East Ardougne]] market stalls. |x:2656,y:3301,title:[[Silk merchant]],desc:3. Sell [[silk]] to the Silk trader in [[East Ardougne]] for 60 coins each. |x:2618,y:3309,title:[[Altar]],desc:4. Use the altar in [[East Ardougne]]'s church. |x:2676,y:3170,title:[[Fishing Trawler]],desc:5. Go out fishing on the Fishing Trawler. |x:2516,y:3356,title:[[Combat Training Camp]],desc:6. Enter the Combat Training Camp north of [[West Ardougne]]. |x:2678,y:3153,title:[[Tindel Merchant]],desc:7. Have Tindel Marchant identify a [[rusty sword]] for you. |x:2561,y:3311,title:[[Lever (Ardougne)|Ardougne lever]],desc:8. Use the Ardougne lever to teleport to the [[Wilderness]]. |x:2567,y:3083,title:[[Aleck's Hunter Emporium.|Aleck's Hunter Emporium]],desc:9. View Aleck's Hunter Emporium in [[Yanille]]. |x:2621,y:3292,title:[[Probita]],desc:10. Check what pets you have insured with Probita in [[East Ardougne]]. }} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Items Required |- | {{Checklist| *[[Silk]] *100 [[coins]] (200 is recommended) *[[Rusty sword]] (two are recommended) *[[Knife]] or [[slash]]ing [[weapon]] }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Skills Needed |- | {{Checklist| *{{SCP|Thieving|5|link=yes}} }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Quests required |- | {{Checklist|smallindent=yes|notoggleparent=yes| *[[Biohazard]] **[[Plague City]] *[[Rune Mysteries]] }} |} {| class="wikitable lighttable qc-active diary-table" style=width:750px; data-diary-name="Ardougne" data-diary-tier="Easy" ! style="width:50%;" | Task ! style="width:50%;" | Requirements |- |1. Have [[Wizard Cromperty]] teleport you to the [[Rune essence mine]] (right-click him to ''Teleport''). | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Rune Mysteries]] |- |2. Steal a [[cake]] from the [[East Ardougne]] [[Ardougne Baker's Stall.|market stalls]]. | *{{SCP|Thieving|5|link=y}} |- |3. Sell [[silk]] to the [[Silk merchant|Silk trader]] in [[East Ardougne]] for 60 coins each. | *[[Silk]] *''Can be stolen from his [[silk stall]], however 10 minutes must pass from the last stolen silk before he talks to you.'' |- |4. Use the altar in [[East Ardougne]]'s church (requires less than full Prayer points). |{{NA|None}} |- |5. Go out fishing on the [[Fishing Trawler]] (you only need to start the minigame) |{{NA|None}} |- |6. Enter the [[Combat Training Camp]] north of [[West Ardougne]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Biohazard]] |- |7. Have [[Tindel Marchant]] identify a [[rusty sword]] for you. | *[[Rusty sword]] and 100 [[coins]] *''You might need to do this more than once, as there is a 1/96 chance the sword turns out to be nothing'' |- |8. Use the [[Ardougne teleport lever|Ardougne lever]] to teleport to the [[Wilderness]] (you may pull the lever there to return). |{{NA|None}} |- |9. View [[Aleck's Hunter Emporium.|Aleck's Hunter Emporium]] in [[Yanille]]. |{{NA|None}} |- |10. Check what pets you have insured with [[Probita]] in [[East Ardougne]] (right-click her to ''Check''). |{{NA|None}} |} ===Rewards=== *[[Ardougne cloak 1]] **Unlimited teleports to the [[Ardougne Monastery]] *[[Antique lamp]] worth 2,500 experience in any skill above 30 *Double [[death rune]]s (200) when trading in cats to civilians *10% increased chance to successfully steal from stalls in [[Ardougne]] *[[Jubster]] and [[Frogeel]] drops will be noted at the [[Tower of Life (building)|Tower of Life]] ==Medium== {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Items Required |- | {{Checklist| *[[Dramen staff|Dramen]] or [[Lunar staff]] *[[Mith grapple]] and any [[Crossbow (weapon)|crossbow]] *Means to cast [[Ardougne Teleport]] (2 [[water rune]]s and 2 [[law rune]]s) *3 [[strawberry seed]]s *[[Rake]] *[[Seed dibber]] *[[Yew log]], or a total of 11 yew logs and one regular log if the [[balloon route]] to [[Castle Wars]] has not been unlocked yet *[[Raw chicken]] *[[Raw swordfish]] *Any [[light source]] *[[Skavid map]] *[[Iban's upgraded staff]], or 200,000 [[coins]] and [[Iban's staff]] to upgrade it *[[Fishing rod]] and [[bait]], or a [[small fishing net]] Recommended: *[[Basket of apples]] }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Skills Needed |- | {{Checklist| *{{SCP|Agility|39|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Attack|50|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Construction|10|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Crafting|49|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Farming|31|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Firemaking|50|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Magic|51|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Ranged|25|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Strength|38|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Thieving|38|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Woodcutting|36|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Quest|20|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} Ironmen: *{{SCP|Fletching|59|link=yes}}{{Prereq|To make a mithril grapple.}} *{{SCP|Smithing|59|link=yes}}{{Prereq|To make a mithril grapple.}} }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Quests Required |- | {{Checklist|smallindent=yes|notoggleparent=yes| *Started [[Fairytale II - Cure a Queen]] **[[Fairytale I - Growing Pains]] ***[[Lost City]] ***[[Nature Spirit]] ****[[The Restless Ghost]] ****[[Priest in Peril]] *[[Enlightened Journey]] *[[The Hand in the Sand]] *[[Watchtower]] (partial completion) *[[Sea Slug]] (partial completion) *[[Tower of Life]] *[[Underground Pass]] **[[Biohazard]] ***[[Plague City]] }} |- | |} {| class="wikitable lighttable qc-active diary-table" style=width:750px; data-diary-name="Ardougne" data-diary-tier="Medium" ! style="width:50%;" | Task ! style="width:50%;" | Requirements |- |1. Enter the [[unicorn]] pen in [[Ardougne Zoo]] using [[Fairy ring]]s ({{Fairycode|bis}}). | *{{SCP|Quest}} Started [[Fairytale II - Cure a Queen]] *[[Dramen staff|Dramen]] or [[Lunar staff]] |- |2. Grapple over [[Yanille]]'s south wall and jump off. | *{{SCP|Agility|39|link=y}}, {{SCP|Strength|38|link=y}} and {{SCP|Ranged|21|link=y}} *[[Mith grapple]] and any [[Crossbow (weapon)|crossbow]] |- |3. Harvest some [[Strawberry|strawberries]] from the [[Ardougne]] [[farming patch]]. | *{{SCP|Farming|31|link=y}} *3 [[strawberry seed]]s, [[spade]], [[rake]] and a [[seed dibber]] *''Recommended: a [[basket of apples]] to pay the nearby gardener to make sure the crop grows'' |- |4. Cast the [[Ardougne Teleport]] spell. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Plague City]] *{{SCP|Magic|51|link=y}} and means to cast [[Ardougne Teleport]] ({{RuneReq|Water=2|Law=2}}) |- |5. Travel to [[Castle Wars]] by [[Balloon transport system|Hot Air Balloon]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Enlightened Journey]] *{{SCP|Firemaking|50|link=y}} *[[Yew log]] *If the route has not been unlocked yet, a total of 11 yew logs and one regular [[log]] are needed to unlock the trip, then fly back and forth once. |- |6. Claim [[buckets of sand]] from [[Bert]] in [[Yanille]].
''[[Ultimate Ironman]] [[File:Ultimate ironman chat badge.png]] only; Fill a bucket with sand using Bert's sand pit.'' | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[The Hand in the Sand]]
''[[Ultimate Ironman]] [[File:Ultimate ironman chat badge.png]] only; [[Bucket]]'' |- |7. Catch any fish on the [[Fishing Platform]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Started [[Sea Slug]] *[[Fishing rod]] and [[Fishing bait|bait]], or a [[small fishing net]] |- |8. Pickpocket the [[master farmer]] north of [[East Ardougne]]. | *{{SCP|Thieving|38|link=y}} |- |9. Collect some [[cave nightshade]] from the [[Skavid caves]] (can be found in the northernmost cave). | *{{SCP|Quest}} Partial completion of [[Watchtower]] *Any [[light source]] and the [[Skavid map]] |- |10. Kill a [[swordchick]] in the [[Tower of Life (building)|Tower of Life]] (southwest in the basement). | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Tower of Life]] *[[Raw chicken]] and [[raw swordfish]] |- |11. Equip an [[Iban's upgraded staff]] or upgrade an [[Iban's staff]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Underground Pass]] *[[Iban's upgraded staff]], or 200,000 [[coins]] and [[Iban's staff]] to have the [[Dark Mage]] in [[West Ardougne]] upgrade it. |- |12. Visit the island east of the [[Necromancer Tower]] ({{Fairycode|air}}). | *{{SCP|Quest}} Started [[Fairytale II - Cure a Queen]] *[[Dramen staff|Dramen]] or [[Lunar staff]] |} ===Rewards=== *[[Ardougne cloak 2]] **Three daily teleports to [[Ardougne]] [[farm patch]] *[[Antique lamp]] worth 7,500 experience in any skill of level 40 or higher *100 free noted [[pure essence]] every day from [[Wizard Cromperty]] *[[Unicow]], [[Newtroost]], and [[Spidine]] drops will be noted at the [[Tower of Life (building)|Tower of Life]] *10% increased chance to [[pickpocket]] in Ardougne (even if the cloak is not equipped or in inventory{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/873096746355703809|date=9 June 2017|archiveurl=https://archive.is/86Jds|archivedate=25 May 2020|quote=No, you just need to have unlocked the diary reward.|name=Thieving}}) *Ability to toggle the [[Ring of life]] teleport to Ardougne *Receive additional [[runes]] when crafting essence at the [[Ourania Altar]] ==Hard== {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! Recharge some [[jewellery]] at the [[Totem Pole (Legends' Guild|Totem pole]] in the [[Legends' Guild]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Legends' Quest]] *Less than fully charged [[skills necklace]] or [[combat bracelet]] |- |2. Check the health of a [[palm tree]] near [[Tree Gnome Village (location)|Tree Gnome Village]] (the patch next to [[Gileth]]). | *{{SCP|Farming|68|link=y}} *[[Palm tree sapling]], [[spade]] and a [[rake]] *''Recommended: 15 [[Papaya fruit]] to pay the gardener'' |- |8. Pick some [[poison ivy berries]] from the patch south of [[East Ardougne]] (Near the [[Ardougne Monastery]]). | *{{SCP|Farming|70|link=y}} *[[Poison ivy seed]], [[seed dibber]] and a [[rake]] |- |9. Smith a [[Mithril platebody]] near [[Ardougne]] (the [[Port Khazard]], [[Yanille]], or [[West Ardougne]] [[anvil]]). | *{{SCP|Smithing|68|link=y}} *5 [[mithril bar]]s and a [[hammer]] |- |10. Enter your [[POH]] from [[Yanille]]. | *{{SCP|Construction|50|link=y}}{{Boostable|no}} *25,000 [[coins]] if your house is not yet in Yanille |- |11. Smith a [[Dragon sq shield]] in [[West Ardougne]]. | *{{SCP|Smithing|60|link=y}} *[[Shield left half]], [[shield right half]] and a [[hammer]] |- |12. Craft some [[death rune]]s from essence. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Mourning's End Part II]] *{{SCP|Runecraft|65|link=y}} *[[Pure]] or [[daeyalt essence]] and a [[death talisman]] or access to the [[Abyss]] *If entering via the [[Mourner Headquarters]], you require [[Mourner gear|Mourner Gear]] and a [[crystal trinket]] |} ===Rewards=== *[[Ardougne cloak 3]] **Five daily teleports to [[Ardougne]] [[farm patch]] *[[Antique lamp]] worth 15,000 experience in any skill above 50 *150 free noted [[pure essence]] every day from [[Wizard Cromperty]] *Ability to toggle [[Watchtower Teleport]] to the centre of [[Yanille]] *10% increased chance of succeeding when [[pickpocketing]] around [[Gielinor]] ==Elite== {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Items Required |- | {{Checklist| *[[Lockpick]] *[[Yew log]] *[[Sinew]] *[[Runite bar]] *[[Salve amulet(i)]] or [[Salve amulet(ei)]], or the regular [[Salve amulet]] and 800,000 [[Nightmare Zone]] points to imbue it **Note that this cannot be a Salve Amulet imbued via [[Soul Wars]]{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1356917400210448389|date=3 February 2021|archiveurl=https://archive.is/quete|archivedate=5 February 2021|quote=Yes. Seems to be the case for everything that can be imbued in the two different places - rings, amulets, etc. I suspect that was to stop people getting the imbue in one place, then trying to refund it in the other place.}} *[[Torstol seed]] *[[Seed dibber]] *[[Rake]] *Means to cast [[Ice Barrage]] (2 [[blood runes]], 4 [[death runes]] and 6 [[water runes]]) *[[Hammer]] *[[Knife]] Recommended: *[[Ultracompost]] }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Skills Needed |- | {{Checklist| *{{SCP|Agility|90|link=yes}}{{Boostable|Yes}} *{{SCP|Cooking|91|link=yes}}{{Boostable|Yes}} *{{SCP|Crafting|35|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Farming|85|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Firemaking|50|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Fishing|81|link=yes}}{{Boostable|No}} *{{SCP|Fletching|69|link=yes}} *{{SCP|Herblore|10|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Magic|94|link=yes}}{{Boostable|Yes}} *{{SCP|Ranged|40|link=yes}}{{Prereq}} *{{SCP|Smithing|91|link=yes}}{{Boostable|Yes}} *{{SCP|Thieving|82|link=yes}}{{Boostable|Yes}} }} |} {| class="mw-collapsible mw-collapsed" ! style="text-align:left;" |Quests Required |- | {{Checklist|smallindent=yes|notoggleparent=yes| *[[Desert Treasure]] **[[The Dig Site]] ***[[Druidic Ritual]] **[[Temple of Ikov]] **[[The Tourist Trap]] **[[Troll Stronghold]] ***[[Death Plateau]] **[[Priest in Peril]] **[[Waterfall Quest]] *[[Haunted Mine]] }} |} {| class="wikitable lighttable qc-active diary-table" style=width:750px; data-diary-name="Ardougne" data-diary-tier="Elite" ! style="width:50%;" | Task ! style="width:50%;" | Requirements |- |1. Catch a [[manta ray]] in the [[Fishing Trawler]] and cook it in [[Port Khazard]]. | *{{SCP|Fishing|81|link=y}}{{Boostable|no}} and {{SCP|Cooking|91|link=y}} *Multiple [[raw manta ray]]s may be needed in case the player burns them |- |2. Attempt ''(and succeed)'' to picklock the door to the basement of [[Yanille Agility dungeon]]. | *{{SCP|Thieving|82|link=y}} *[[Lockpick]] |- |3. Pickpocket a [[hero]]. | *{{SCP|Thieving|80|link=y}} |- |4. Make a [[rune crossbow]] yourself from scratch within [[Witchaven]] or [[Yanille]].
''You must use the [[spinning wheel]] in Witchaven to make the [[crossbow string]], and the [[anvil]] in
Yanille to make the [[runite limbs]]. Then finish making the crossbow in either of the two towns.'' | *{{SCP|Crafting|10|link=y}}, {{SCP|Smithing|91|link=y}} and {{SCP|Fletching|69|link=y}} *[[Yew logs]], [[runite bar]], [[hammer]], [[knife]], and [[sinew]] or a non-magic [[tree root]]. |- |5. Imbue a [[salve amulet]] at [[Nightmare Zone]] or equip a [[salve amulet(i)]].
''This '''cannot''' be imbued via [[Zeal Tokens]] from [[Soul Wars]]{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1356917400210448389|date=3 February 2021|archiveurl=https://archive.is/quete|archivedate=5 February 2021|quote=Yes. Seems to be the case for everything that can be imbued in the two different places - rings, amulets, etc. I suspect that was to stop people getting the imbue in one place, then trying to refund it in the other place.}}.'' | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of the [[Haunted Mine]] *Access to the [[Nightmare Zone]] *[[Salve amulet(i)]] or [[Salve amulet(ei)]], or the regular [[Salve amulet]] and 800,000 [[Nightmare Zone]] points to imbue it |- |6. Pick some [[torstol]] from the [[Herb patch|patch]] north of [[East Ardougne]]. | *{{SCP|Farming|85|link=y}} *[[Torstol seed]], [[seed dibber]] and a [[rake]] *[[Ultracompost]] is recommended |- |7. Complete a lap of [[Ardougne Rooftop Course|Ardougne's rooftop agility course]]. | *{{SCP|Agility|90|link=y}} |- |8. Cast [[Ice Barrage]] on another player within [[Castle Wars]]. | *{{SCP|Quest}} Completion of [[Desert Treasure]] *{{SCP|Magic|94|link=y}} (boostable from {{SCP|Magic|85}} with a [[Castlewars brew]])
